name: IteratorUtils_forEachTest
description: Unit tests for the forEach method in IteratorUtils, focusing on various edge cases and behaviors.

test_cases.name: testForEach_NullIterator
test_cases.description: Tests the forEach method with a null iterator. No exception should be thrown.

test_cases.name: testForEach_NonNullIterator
test_cases.description: Tests the forEach method with a non-null iterator and verifies the closure is called correctly.

test_cases.name: testForEach_NullClosure
test_cases.description: Tests the forEach method with a null closure, expecting a NullPointerException.

test_cases.name: testForEach_IteratorThrowsException
test_cases.description: Tests the forEach method when the iterator throws a NoSuchElementException.
